blogPost.excerpt: Bytesize empowers creators to rapidly build clean, mobile-optimized, dynamic sites to help drive engagement between platforms, interact with their fans, and ultimately grow their brand. With Bytesize, your virtual self is just one link away! 🤩
blogPost.body: Bytesize empowers creators to rapidly build clean, mobile-optimized, dynamic sites to help drive engagement between platforms, interact with their fans, and ultimately grow their brand. With Bytesize, your virtual self is just one link away! 🤩
blogPost.title: Bytesize - Create a beautiful, personal social media canvas in seconds
blogPost.author: Gideon Tay Yee Chuen

localize.description: Bytesize使创作者能够快速建立干净、移动优化的动态网站，以帮助推动平台之间的互动，与粉丝互动，并最终发展他们的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虚拟自我只需一个链接就能实现。🤩
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内创建一个美丽的个人社交媒体画布。

localize.description: Bytesize使創作者能夠快速建立乾淨、移動優化的動態網站，以幫助推動平臺之間的互動，與粉絲互動，並最終發展他們的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虛擬自我只需一個鏈接就能實現。🤩
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建一個美麗的個人社交媒體畫布。

previous.excerpt: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
previous.title: Blogstreak - All things needed for running static blog

localize.description: Blogstreak是你博客的工具库。如果你想为你的静态博客提供漂亮的掌声和评论，那么不用再看了，blogstreak有答案。Blogstreak使用最新的webcomponent技术，所以它是高度可定制的。
localize.tagline: 运行静态博客所需的所有东西

localize.description: Blogstreak是你博客的工具庫。如果你想爲你的靜態博客提供漂亮的掌聲和評論，那麼不用再看了，blogstreak有答案。Blogstreak使用最新的webcomponent技術，所以它是高度可定製的。
localize.tagline: 運行靜態博客所需的所有東西

next.excerpt: Gravity is a sales intelligence platform helping individuals leverage triggering events that signal when to reach out to prospects. These events include when a prospect changes a job, when a company receives funding or when a company is growing quickly.
next.title: Gravity - Reach out to prospects at the right time, every time

localize.description: Gravity是一个销售智能平台，帮助个人利用触发事件，提示何时与潜在客户联系。这些事件包括当潜在客户更换工作时，当公司获得资金时，或者当公司快速发展时。
localize.tagline: 每次都能在正确的时间与潜在客户取得联系

localize.description: Gravity是一個銷售智能平臺，幫助個人利用觸發事件，提示何時與潛在客戶聯繫。這些事件包括當潛在客戶更換工作時，當公司獲得資金時，或者當公司快速發展時。
localize.tagline: 每次都能在正確的時間與潛在客戶取得聯繫
